类 CRectButton

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.buttons.KButton
org.kelvinizer.buttons.CRectButton
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable, Focusable, Scalable
public class CRectButton extends KButton
The CRectButton class represents a custom button with rectangular bounds and support for different states (normal, focused, and selected). It extends KButton and provides functionality for managing graphical representation and scaling.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 org.kelvinizer.buttons.KButton

      public void setNormal(BoundedString bs)
      Sets the normal state representation of the button.

      Sets the onFocus state representation of the button.
      参数:
      bs - the BoundedString for the focused state

    • scale

      public void scale(Dimension d)
      Scales the button's bounds and spaces based on the given dimensions.
      参数:

    • setIcon

      public boolean setIcon(String iconPath)
      Sets the icon for the button from the given file path.
      参数:
      iconPath - the path to the icon file
      返回:
      true if the icon was successfully loaded, false otherwise
